title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8011.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8011.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

It is the responsibility and the intent of the division to
adopt regulations pursuant to the HIV- and AIDS-Related Information Act (Public

Health Law, article 27-F). All officers, employees, and agents of the division
shall at all times maintain the confidentiality of any HIV-related information
in their possession, in accordance with the requirements of the statute and
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8011.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
